      • linkNodes

        public Edge linkNodes(Node sourceNode,
             Node destinationNode)
        Link two nodes. If the source or destination nodes are not in the graph, they are added to it. No check is performed to ensure that the nodes are linked to other nodes in the graph.
        Parameters:
        sourceNode - source node
        destinationNode - destination node
        Returns:
        created edge

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Validate the graph. It checks out basics about the graph, such as whether all nodes have at least one incoming and outgoing edge, except for the initial and final.
        Returns:
        if true, graph validation passed

      • printGraph

        public void printGraph()
        Prints out the graph. For debugging purposes.
